Package pfriendly

Class YupJ2

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PImage
      • processing.core.PGraphics
        • processing.awt.PGraphicsJava2D
          • pfriendly.YupJ2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IUp, IYup2, processing.core.PConstants
    public class YupJ2
extends processing.awt.PGraphicsJava2D
implements IYup2
    A 2D renderer based on the Java AWT (Abstract Window Toolkit). Supposes that the the camera is looking down on a 2D plane from the z axis, making (0.0, 1.0) the forward -- or up -- axis.
